00065 #ifndef CONFPARSER_H
00066 #define CONFPARSER_H
00067 
00068 #include <stdio.h>
00069 
00070 
00071 #define MAXSTRLEN   1024
00072 
00073 
00074 /* A program consists of several blocks,
00075  * each block consists of variables definitions
00076  * and subblocks.
00077  */
00078 
00079 /* forward declaration of generic item */
00080 struct _generic_item_;
00081 
00082 typedef enum {
00083                 TYPE_BLOCK,
00084                 TYPE_AFFECT
00085              } type_item;
00086                 
00087                 
00088 typedef struct _type_affect_ {
00089 
00090     char varname[MAXSTRLEN];
00091     char varvalue[MAXSTRLEN];
00092     
00093 } type_affect;
00094 
00095 
00096 typedef struct _type_block_ {
00097 
00098     char                    block_name[MAXSTRLEN];
00099     struct _generic_item_ * block_content;
00100     
00101 } type_block;
00102 
00103 
00104 typedef struct _generic_item_ {
00105     
00106     type_item   type;
00107     union
00108     {
00109        type_block  block;
00110        type_affect affect;
00111     }item;
00112     
00113     /* next item in the list */
00114     struct _generic_item_ * next;    
00115         
00116 } generic_item;
00117 
00118 
00119 typedef generic_item * list_items;
00120 
00124 list_items * config_CreateItemsList();
00125 
00129 generic_item * config_CreateBlock(char * blockname, list_items * list);
00130 
00134 generic_item * config_CreateAffect(char * varname, char * varval);
00135 
00136 
00140 void config_AddItem( list_items * list, generic_item * item );
00141 
00142 
00146 void config_print_list(FILE * output, list_items * list);
00147 
00152 void config_free_list(list_items * list);
00153 
00154 
00155 
00156 
00157 #endif
